marytts.cart
Class CART

java.lang.Object
  marytts.cart.DirectedGraph
      marytts.cart.CART
Direct Known Subclasses:
FeatureVectorCART, StringPredictionTree
public class CART
extends DirectedGraph

A tree is a specific kind of directed graph in which each node can have only a single parent node. It consists exclusively of DecisionNode and LeafNode nodes.

Author:
marc

Build a new cart with the given node as the root node

Parameters:
rootNode - the root node of the CART
featDef - the feature definition used for interpreting the meaning of decision node criteria.
properties - a generic properties object, which can be used to encode information about the tree and the way the data in it should be represented.

interpretToNode

public Node interpretToNode(Target target,
                            int minNumberOfData)
Passes the given item through this CART and returns the leaf Node, or the Node it stopped walking down.

Parameters:
target - the target to analyze
minNumberOfData - the minimum number of data requested. If this is 0, walk down the CART until the leaf level.
Returns:
the Node

public static Node replaceLeafByCart(CART cart,
                                     LeafNode leaf)
In this tree, replace the given leaf with the given CART

Returns:
